sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Form.css' import useModal from './useModal' const OrderForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", price: "", address:"", quantity: 0, description:"", category:"", image:"" }) const handleChange = e => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(formData); } return (
